name: Creix: The Dungeon Of Escape
description:
Creix: Dungeon of Escape is a RPG-Puzzle-Skill based game, in which you're controlling Creix, and your goal is to get out of a weird dungeon.
This is my very first big game. It's not a masterpiece, because I lack experience and skill of a professional game developer, but I'm proud of it and worked really hard on it.
This game contains tons of secrets and hidden messages, which, when gathered, come to a conclusion, so if you like mysteries, codes and all this stuff, you'll have a lot of fun (hopefully :v)
The music is not composed by me, because I'm not a composer, but I did my best not to use copyrighted stuff.
Although, I might've used something I shouldn't have. If so, tell me, and I'll try to swap it with something else.
I hope you have a good time playing my game. >>app4K<<
~Kagedile
